J. Rose Published by Evil Eye Concepts , Incorporated All rights reserved . No part of this book may be reproduced , scanned , or distributed in any printed or electronic form without permission . Names , places , characters and incidents are the product of [the author]269-the author ’s imagination and are fictitious . Any resemblance to [actual persons]271-actual persons , living or dead , events or establishments is solely coincidental .

Book DescriptionThe Marriage ArrangementA Marriage to a Billionaire NovellaBy Jennifer Probst From New York Times and [USA]1-usa Today bestselling author [Jennifer Probst]58-jennifer comes a new story in [her]58-jennifer Marriage to a Billionaire series . The Book of Spells returns in this sparkling addition to the series ! [She]58-jennifer had run from [her]58-jennifer demons … [Caterina Victoria Windsor]59-caterina fled [[her]59-caterina family winery]272-her family winery after a humiliating broken engagement , and spent the past year in [Italy]2-italy rebuilding [[her]59-caterina world]273-her world . But when [Ripley Savage]60-ripley savage shows up with a plan to bring [her]58-jennifer back [home]274-home , and an outrageous demand for [her]58-jennifer to marry [him]275-his , [she]58-jennifer has no choice but to return to face [her]58-jennifer past . But when simple attraction begins to run deeper , [Cat]61-cat has to decide if [she]58-jennifer ’s strong enough to trust again … and strong enough to stay … [He]275-his vowed to bring [her]58-jennifer back [home]274-home to be [[his]275-his wife]277-his wife … [Rip Savage]62-rip saved [Windsor Winery]3-windsor winery , but the only way to make it truly [his]275-his is to marry into [the family]278-the family . [He]62-rip ’s not about to walk away from the only thing [he]62-rip ’s ever wanted , even if [he]62-rip has to tame [the spoiled brat who left [her]279-the spoiled brat who left her legacy and her father behind without a care legacy and [[her]279-the spoiled brat who left her legacy and her father behind without a care father]280-her father behind without a care]279-the spoiled brat who left her legacy and her father behind without a care . When [he]62-rip convinces [her]58-jennifer to agree to a marriage arrangement and return [home]274-home , [he]62-rip never counted on the fierce sexual attraction between [them]282-them to grow into something more . But when deeper emotions emerge , [Rip]62-rip has to fight for something [he]62-rip wants even more than [Winsor Winery]15-winsor winery : [[his]62-rip future wife]283-his future wife . * * Every 1001 Dark Nights novella is a standalone story . For [new readers]284-new readers , it ’s an introduction to [[an author]285-an author ’s world]286-an author ’s world . And for [fans]287-fans , it ’s a bonus book in [the author]269-the author ’s series . [We]289-we hope [you]290-you 'll enjoy each one as much as [we]289-we do . * *

FALL IN LOVE WITH [THE MARRIAGE TO A BILLIONAIRE SERIES]291-the marriage to a billionaire series ! “ It ’s always been [you]290-you . [I]64-dominick do n’t want [anybody else]1356-anybody else ; [I]64-dominick do n’t dream about [anybody else]1356-anybody else . It ’s only [you]290-you . ”[64-dominick] – [Nick]64-dominick to [Alexa]65-alexandra ivy , The Marriage Bargain “ For [someone]1358-someone to hurt [you]65-alexandra ivy like this makes [me]67-michael question what is fair and right in [this world]1359-this world . But [you]290-you , [mia amore]66-mia amore , took such an event and gained strength . [You]290-you made [your]290-you life on [your]290-you own terms with [no one]1360-no one to help . [You]290-you humble [me]67-michael . ”[67-michael] – [Michael]67-michael to [Maggie]68-maggie , The Marriage Trap “ And as for cooking , [I]69-mama conte am doing this for one reason . [Every woman]1361-every woman should know how to make one signature dessert . Not for [anyone else]1362-anyone else but [herself]1361-every woman . Now , mix . ”[69-mama conte] – [Mama Conte]69-mama conte to [Maggie]68-maggie , The Marriage Trap “ [You]290-you need to be strong on [your]290-you own before [you]290-you can be strong with [someone else]1363-someone else . ”[69-mama conte] – [Mama Conte]69-mama conte to [Carina]70-carina , The Marriage Mistake “ Did [you]292-you ever think [I]292-you want more than [any man]1364-any man can handle ? ”[292-you] The brave words lost a bit of impact as [he]292-you tugged on [her]68-maggie earlobe and a breathy gasp escaped . “ All this time , [you]292-you ’ve been wrong , [Max]71-max . It ’s not [me]292-you who ca n’t handle [them]1365-them . ”[292-you] [She]68-maggie smiled up at [him]292-you in pure challenge . “ [They]1365-them ca n’t handle [me]68-maggie . ”[68-maggie] – [Max]71-max and [Carina]70-carina , The Marriage Mistake “ [You]292-you offer [me]292-you an apology ? ”[292-you] [he]292-you tore out , golden eyes spitting sparks of fiery rage as [he]292-you shook [her]68-maggie slightly . “ [You]292-you think [I]292-you ’m upset because [I]292-you ’m stuck with [you]292-you ? How dare [you]292-you call [yourself]292-you a charity case to [the man who kissed [you]292-you and stripped [you]292-you and fucked [you]292-you for so many hours [we]1367-we both fell into exhaustion]1366-the man who kissed you and stripped you and fucked you for so many hours we both fell into exhaustion ? [You]292-you deserve [a man]1368-a man to be whole — [a man who can offer [you]292-you a decent life and not tear [you]292-you apart piece by piece . [I]292-you ’ll never be able to give [you]292-you what [you]292-you need]1369-a man who can offer you a decent life and not tear you apart piece by piece . i ’ll never be able to give you what you need . Do n’t [you]292-you understand [I]292-you ’m frozen inside ? There ’s nothing left to give [you]292-you except physical pleasure . ”[292-you] – [Sawyer]72-sawyer to [Julietta]73-julietta , The Marriage Merger [She]73-julietta rose and came to [him]293-him . Strong arms held [him]293-him with no apology , no hesitation . [She]73-julietta stroked [his]293-him hair like [a mother]294-a mother would , soothing [him]293-him with [her]73-julietta warmth and safety and beliefs . “ [[My]73-julietta sweet boy]1370-my sweet boy , yes , [you]293-him can . [Your]293-him life is [your]293-him own . [You]293-him were [a child]1371-a child and could not protect [the ones [you]293-him loved]1372-the ones you loved . [None of [us]1374-us]1373-none of us can . So instead , [we]1374-us choose to love as much as possible , and that needs to be enough . ”[73-julietta] – [Mama Conte]69-mama conte to [Sawyer]72-sawyer , The Marriage Merger

About [Jennifer ProbstJennifer Probst]74-jennifer probstjennifer probst is the New York Times , USA Today , and Wall Street Journal bestselling [author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance . [She]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance was thrilled [her]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance novel , The Marriage Bargain , was the # 6 Bestselling Book on Amazon for 2012 , and spent 26 weeks on the New York Times . [Her]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance work has been translated in over a dozen countries , sold over a million copies , and was dubbed a “ romance phenom ”[295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance] by Kirkus Reviews . [She]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance makes [her]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance home in [New York]4-new york with [[her]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance sons]296-her sons , [husband]297-husband , two rescue dogs , and [a house that never seems to be clean]298-a house that never seems to be clean . [She]295-author of both sexy and erotic contemporary romance loves hearing from [all readers]299-all readers ! One Thousand and One Dark NightsOnce upon a time , in the future … [I]0-i was [a student fascinated with stories and learning]321-a student fascinated with stories and learning . [I]0-i studied philosophy , poetry , history , the occult , andthe art and science of love and magic . [I]0-i had a vastlibrary at [[[my]0-i father]322-my father ’s home]323-my father ’s home and collected thousandsof volumes of fantastic tales . [I]0-i learned all about ancient races and bygonetimes . About myths and legends and dreams of [allpeople]324-allpeople through the millennium . And the more [I]0-i readthe stronger [my]0-i imagination grew until [I]0-i discoveredthat [I]0-i was able to travel into the stories ... to actuallybecome part of them . [I]0-i wish [I]0-i could say that [I]0-i listened to [[my]0-i teacherand]325-my teacherand respected [my]0-i gift , as [I]0-i ought to have . If [I]0-i had , [Iwould]0-i not be telling [you]326-you this tale now . But [I]0-i was foolhardy and confused , showing offwith bravery . One afternoon , curious about the myth of theArabian Nights , [I]0-i traveled back to ancient [Persia]13-persia tosee for [myself]0-i if it was true that every day [Shahryar(Persian]142-shahryar(persian : شهريار , [“ king ”]1375-“ king ”[142-shahryar(persian] ) married [a new virgin]327-a new virgin , and thensent yesterday 's wife to be beheaded . It was writtenand [I]0-i had read , that by the time [he]142-shahryar(persian met [Scheherazade]143-scheherazade , [[the vizier]328-the vizier 's daughter]329-the vizier 's daughter , [he]142-shahryar(persian ’d killed [one thousandwomen]330-one thousandwomen . Something went wrong with [my]0-i efforts . [I]0-i arrivedin the midst of the story and somehow exchangedplaces with [Scheherazade]143-scheherazade – a phenomena that hadnever occurred before and that still to this day , Icannot explain . Now [I]0-i am trapped in that ancient past . The Start of Something GoodStay , Book 1By Jennifer ProbstComing June 5 , 2018Click here to purchase Discover the brand new STAY series ! War changed [him]1344-him . [Betrayal]264-betrayal wounded [her]1342-my therapist . But [everyone]1390-everyone ’s heart deserves a second chance . When [Ethan Bishop]265-ethan returns to [the Hudson Valley]37-the hudson valley , [his]265-ethan body and spirit are a little worse for wear . As [a former Special Forces paratrooper]1346-a former special forces paratrooper , [he]265-ethan saw [his]265-ethan fair share of conflict , and [he]265-ethan came [home]274-home with wounds , inside and out . At [[his]265-ethan sisters ’ B & B and [farm]1349-farm]1348-his sisters ’ b & b and farm , [he]265-ethan can keep all [his]265-ethan pain at a safe distance . But quiet time is n’t easy when [a fiery woman]1350-a fiery woman explodes into [his]265-ethan life … It ’s business — not pleasure — that brings [Manhattan PR agent Mia Thrush]266-mia reluctantly to [the farm]1351-the farm . Tightly wound and quick tempered , [Mia]266-mia clashes immediately with the brooding [Ethan]265-ethan . Everything about [him]265-ethan is irritating — from [his]265-ethan lean muscles and piercing blue eyes to [his]265-ethan scent of sweat and musk . But as the summer unfolds and temperatures rise , [Ethan]265-ethan and [Mia]266-mia discover how much [they]1352-their have in common : [their]1352-their guarded histories , an uncontrollable desire , and a passion for the future that could heal two broken hearts . But will [their]1352-their pasts threaten [their]1352-their fragile chance at a brand - new future ?
